line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained")
create_ing(ing1, "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained")
create_ing(ing2, "3 1/2 cups frozen whipped topping, thawed")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the oranges, pineapple, whipped topping, coconut, marshmallows and milk.
In a large bowl, combine the oranges, pineapple, whipped topping, coconut, marshmallows and milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing7, "fruit mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the oranges, pineapple, whipped topping, coconut, marshmallows and milk.
Mix together well and chill 1 hour before serving.
Mix together well and chill 1 hour before serving.
